aircraft.value: Skyguard MK-7 - AC-3865-805 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Update technical documentation with lessons learned

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 15/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 17/11/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 18/11/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 21/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 24/11/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
